website_summaries.verdict: Whatever your sport, this wetsuit offers good quality and durability while keeping you warm.
pros: Comes in a few different color combos
Good for scuba and other water sports
Has reinforced knees for paddle boarding and surfing
cons: Runs a little small, so think about ordering up a size
Some quality issues reported with the seams ripping

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: Omg, how can I describe this in one word? You can't ...this suit will make you feel like a member of seal team 6. Wether your hunting mountain goats on the coast of Florida or driving your Ferrari up north you will always look super cool. At this price buy two one for you and one for your significant other, so when you leave them in the dust with your new amazing life they won't feel left out. Sit back and enjoy the ride
customer_reviews.author: Creed bradden

customer_reviews.title: Loved these wet suits!
customer_reviews.text: First time wetsuit wearer, it was fantastic. It was thermally protective in very cold waters (snow melt waterfall plunge pool) Excellent experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shirotaka

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice But Make Sure To  Order A Few Sizes Up
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and seem like it will be good, except for the sizing is really hard to figure out. I am 4'11 and weigh 95 pounds with a 24 inch waist, I thought I was playing it safe by ordering a size 6 as wetsuits seem to run a little smaller and it was super tight so I ordered a 8 and the same thing, I am returning both of them and going to order a size 12. Hopefully it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice suit
customer_reviews.text: Fit's as expected. It does run undersized so adjust accordingly..... For me the rubber on the neck is a little to thick and the suit could use a longer zipper. Also on a side note I've tried to contact Lemorecn through facebook ( because I wasn't able to find a webpage for them ) to ask about the 2 year warranty but haven't heard back from them about their warranty and they don't have it posted on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fits great
customer_reviews.text: Received it earlier than expected. It fit great but these may run a little small. I am about 5' 8" and weight about 190lbs. I have a 44' chest so i went al XL. Fits great in the shoulders and chest. If it is a little long you can't tell. I had another brand for many years and this one feels much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mahnh

customer_reviews.title: Cliff jumper recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Snug as a bug. Used for cliff jumping in 18 states this year! Follow @adventurephilly to watch. 5⭐️'S
customer_reviews.author: cheap bitch

customer_reviews.title: Too small, size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 2-4 (s-m) clothing, slim, not busty at all. I got a size 4 first and it is way to small, I cannot get it pass the thigh area and don't even think about the zipper... Get a size 6 and it is better, but cannot close the zipper, neck is choking, and it just don't feel right when you are already exhausted just by wear this thing. It is a struggle to get these on, also suffer a few pinches from hubby when he try to get me on the size 4. I'm going to try another brand. Note: 6 weeks after returned the suit I still have not get my refund!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and warm wore it during a triathlon in a 62 degree lake very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: J_Tingey

customer_reviews.title: I am 6'1'' and 265lbs this suit as a good length for me
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1'' and 265lbs this suit as a good length for me , a XXL would probably fit a bit tight. snoarkel in 52 degree water with no problems. Happy about the quality at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Martin maynard

customer_reviews.title: Large fits tall and skinny people well
customer_reviews.text: Legit im 6' 2" 176lbs and the Large fits perfectly. I thought it would be too short as im very tall compared to the size chart specifications but it wasnt an issue at all. Checked all other wetsuits on Amazon and this one came ontop for the price and look.
customer_reviews.author: JETZAP

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine. Would like a way to tighten wrists and ankles.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL size. It arrived, and I tried it on. At once, it seemed that there should be some way to tighten the wrists and ankles. They were too loose, which allows water in. It seems that this would increase the chances of the water flushing around. Other than that, the fit seems fine, works for my body shape. Knee pads seem a bit low too.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I can swim in this suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit to wear in a triathlon in June. I did not want to spend $200 or $300 on a suit I might wear just one time. I was actually faster swimming wearing the suit. My nipples were sore the next day - got to wear bandaids if I'm going to swim in that suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5-9, 180lbs, and the Large that I bought fits me just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit fits me perfect! I am 6 foot and 230 lb and it fit like a glove. I utilized it once, approximately 4 hours during an ocean dive. It performed just as good as my Henderson 3 mil suit. The only drawback I have compared to my Henderson is the zipper makes it a little tight to Dawn the suit. The zipper does have a long tail string to enable zipping and unzipping without help. For the price you can't beat this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas lemrow

customer_reviews.title: Good 5mm wetsuit, fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for early season dock and mooring installation at a lake in NH. Tried it out in chest deep water it worked well with boots for about 30 mins. Tried to use it to dive down 10th, not so much. I could feel the cold water pain kick in and had to get out. Water was about 54 degrees. I’ll wait a couple weeks and try again. I’m 5’ 10” 170 lbs and the large fit perfectly. So far, zippers on the wrists, ankles and back were easy to use and seams looked well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: This is not only reasonably priced, but is also made well. I have used this suit about a month and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Downs

customer_reviews.title: Good suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good suit for the price, great value. I've worn it for about 10 dives and it shows some minor wear on some of the seams, I probably scraped it on a wreck or rock, but that could have been me getting scraped. Fits about as expected, sleeves and ankles are a little loose, no problem for me as I dive warm water and wear primarily for protection from cuts and scrapes. Could be an issue for colder water use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F.

customer_reviews.title: Slack cuffs
customer_reviews.text: Just tried on for first time. Ankle and wrist openings are way too wide. Material also seems thin for 3/2 suit. Decent quality zipper and the seams seem well stitched. If you want a suit that's easy to get in and out of then this is fine but it won't insulate properly with water flowing in and out at the ankles and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: shooks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep you dry or warm in water
customer_reviews.text: Just tried the suit out in the lake. Water does enter through the sleeves and legs as others have said so you will get wet wearing this and therefore cold in cold water. It doesn't have a skunk smell however. It is comfortable and easy to put on just not a best choice in cold water conditions.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with fit and style.
customer_reviews.text: At 6'0" and 205 pounds I ordered the 3x size. Back zipper more inconvenient than front as expected. No zippers at wrist was manageable but no zippers at ankles required someone's significant effort to remove the suit off my feet and ankles. Finally the biggest issue while in the suit was the collar which was a throat choker even when the velcro closure was released. Construction and material seemed good, but...
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Good value but loosens up when wet
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift which is awesome! They bought be the XXL. Which fit ok but was long and floppy I’m 6’1”, 225 and I needed the XL. Xl fits a lot better but when it gets wet it gets a little lose and floppy around the wrist and ankles. Not complaining as a gift and for the price, can’t go wrong. I use a wetsuit maybe 5 times a year so no need for anything fancy.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the size chart!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this in Mens M based on the size chart and got it three days ago. I found it a bit too snug and significantly shorter than the 5mm suit I already had. I return the M and received a L today (two days later). Even more disappointing! The L was a bit longer in leg and arm but in all other respects tighter. I felt more restricted in the L than I had in the M. The suit appears otherwise nicely put together but I'm just going to return this item and look for another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Couldn't believe for this price - a full wetsuit that keeps me warm in the ocean. I first tested it in April in the Northern California Coast, when average ocean temp is 55 degrees. It's thin and easy to get on and off - for me the thicker ones are a bear to try to get on and off. For short-term (hour or less) boogie boarding I can say it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: LDN

customer_reviews.title: More than was expecting!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is worth the money. I had expensive ones before with recognized name brands and this one did the same job as the other ones. The water did not rush in like some other wetsuits. kept me warm the whole day. The water that day was 72 degrees F. Buy it one size larger than recommended. Will recommend this item any one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Tough to beat for the price if you need a thin wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Use for canyoneering in Zion. Works great for cold canyons on mild days. Has held up well. Cheap enough to not worry using it in rocks and debris. The thin neoprene is ez to get in and moves well. The insulating effects are mild. I would get thicker if the air temp was less than 60 degrees. Used it for swims in deep slot canyons and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie baker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit made with cheap material that I don't think can retain the body warmth. It is itchy when I try to wear it so I prefer not to use it. The size is not very fit either.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Chan

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit especially in legs
customer_reviews.text: This item actually fits great throughout the body, arms and upper legs. However the calf and ankle area are sized way unproportionately. I ride a lot of mountain bikes so my calves are not small yet this is still big around them. Also the actual leg opening around the ankle area is almost as big as the calf section. Without a tight fit around the ankles it basically rides up leaving the ankle and a portion of the calf exposed. Poor design. Unfortunately I didn't actually get to use it until it was too late to return it so now I am stuck with it. Good price but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: E.J. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Don't cheap out - buy the better suits, there's a reason they're more.
customer_reviews.text: The first one ripped on second use. The second one is coming apart at the seams, slowly fraying. Material has become uncomfortable and rubs skin raw. I've cleaned it thoroughly after every use (15 times maybe) and I can feel it stiffening already. There's a reason this suit is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: dane

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars bc the suit runs too small. I’m 128 5’8” size 4 and i ordered a size 8. It was so tight around the neck my face was turning blue! I cut a little slit in the neck and now I love it! It fits like a glove and it’s pretty cute! Haven’t gotten in the water yet but I’ll be using this to paddle board. Overall good suit with adjustments. SIZE UP at least 2 sizes, women!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel DS

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size larger than your mens dress shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size Large mens button-front dress shirt (like an accountant or lawyer wears to work with a necktie) and the large wetsuit fit me like a medium mens dress shirt would fit me - too tight everywhere. I sent it back and got an XL and it's a good fit. Quality of the fabric and zipper seems very good and this seems like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kickstand

customer_reviews.title: Works great, you can tell the difference however...
customer_reviews.text: You can tell the difference with these wet-suits however do not expect to jump into freezing water and feel fine. These create a layer of water between your skin and the outside water so you're going to need to be active in the water to stay warm. For $100 I'd say it was worth it for cold swimming during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Water goes up ankles and into wrists with right size for my body
customer_reviews.text: According to my size and the size chart I purchased the correct size suit for my body. The problem for me is even though it fits super tight I still feel like the ankles and wrists are not tight enough so by me just jumping into my pool I got a rush of cold water up my body although I got used to it and it did keep me warm should this be happening?
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Venture

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer for little money
customer_reviews.text: This suit is very stretchy, fits well and looks good. Maybe it could be a little tighter around the wrists and ankles, but with boots on it is just fine, and a 3mm isn't used for super cold water, although we did go into 48 degree water and it worked well for me with a hood.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice suit for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Although I dis not make it in the water, the suit fit fairly well and I think will work well for cooler weather. I am 5'8" and 205 lbs. The cuffs were a bit big around the ankles and wrists, but my wrists are very small. Suit was tight by the time appendages made it to my forearm and calves.
customer_reviews.author: korby

customer_reviews.title: Nice and TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Treat it like a winter coat with sizing you want it to have some space but not too much. It’s not for people with barrel chest like myself or people who are not too fit they fit super tight but it works.
customer_reviews.author: BRAVO

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: worked great for what I needed. I wear it to clean and open/close my pool and need something to allow me to get it the cold water and do what I need to do. I will probably add the feet/boots at a later time, but that was my oversight and had nothing to do with the item purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm when the others are cold.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Montana with waters in early summer not getting much higher than 50 degrees F. Was very impressed with the price. I purchased the large I am 6'1" 165lbs. Medium would have been to small and xl would definetly have been to big. Overall great suit for the money's.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: This wet suit works great. I have used it several times now in ...
customer_reviews.text: This wet suit works great. I have used it several times now in water as cold as 54 degrees F. I only snorkel so the depth and duration are less than a scuba diver. My wife wants to get one now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: This ran way too small.  The return window ran out 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it was way, way too small. I got busy in life and I didn't engage in the return process until today. I found out I missed the return window by 2 days and there is nothing I can do about it. Now I have a useless wetsuit that is brand new, and no way to contact the company to exchange or return. I'm hoping that this issue gets resolved by Lemorecn
customer_reviews.author: Ian Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy O’Neil wetsuits but I have this one a try. Great price and outstanding performance. Fits well and easily removed when wet. Not the warmest but definitely gets the job done and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: J2

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Size runs small. I am a 5'11" woman weighing 160. According to the chart I would be a men's medium (they didn't have women's available). I couldn't get the suit all the way up. Hoping the large will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: The Puget Sound is cold year round, so I needed a wetsuit. This is a little tight on me. I ordered the XL. I'm 5'11", 215 with a 36" waist. Losing 5 lbs or so would make this a better fit, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all - broken after 6 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Yes, it will keep you warm - until it breaks. After about 6 weeks of using it on the weekends, it’s broken beyond repair. The back zipper would frequently get stuck. Today, it got stuck again and the leash ripped off, leaving me trapped in the wetsuit. The plastic is now broken so it can’t be fixed. On top of that, the material on the knee pads began wearing off after the very first use. Unless you’re planning to use this only a few times, I suggest you pay more for a better wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Conner C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary of this product since it was so cheap but it was a gift for my husband and he loves it!! Works great for those cold pacific waters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. This feels more like a 4/3 in terms of warmth. I’ve been surfing in cape cod with it and the suit has kept me warm. The ocean temp was 57 degrees this morning and I was fine for an hour. Also I’m 6’, 200lbs, 44” chest and the XL fits perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WCM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Pool
customer_reviews.text: Works well for swimming in an outdoor pool with water temps 55F to 65F. Ankles and wrists were a little large for me. However, I do have small ankles and wrists. Otherwise fit was as expected for a wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because, well, it's under $75, so why not? Pleasantly surprised when it was delivered. Tested the seams and fit immediately, and very happy with the purchase. Flexibility in the knees and elbows seem conducive to pretty much any type of use for this imaginable. I'm 5'9 and 215 pounds, the XL fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: It's a good neoprene suit, it's really easy to put on and the quality is really really good for the price you pay. I use it for surfing in the pacific ocean and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Elizalde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This thing fit nice and snug without feeling like I was being smothered. I'm very picky about wetsuits, as I always feel like I'm being squeezed to death. This one fits snugly without the extra squeeze. Collar and cuffs don't choke or cut off circulation as well. I'm 5'10'' and about 195lbs.
customer_reviews.author: D Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. seem to be well made. these are used for diving in the Bahamas. they have not been used long enough to have a feel for the longevity. will let you know when they get some use.
customer_reviews.author: W. D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit well, I wear a size L and this was very tight. Neck line was extremely tight too and very uncomfortable. I will be returning. I recommend Hyperflex brand they are very comfortable and fit well!
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I went to pull up the zipper, it broke and is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edaward Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are about an inch to short and the wrist area is a little lose on me but other than that it keeps me warm. I dove in it in about 62 degree water and got a little chilly but most people would use a thicker wetsuit in those conditions anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy. Took a month to get and it was really small.
customer_reviews.text: Took a month to receive and my man put it on and it was so skin tight he couldn't move. Thought it was going to bust at the seams. Had to return it. Not going to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go snorkeling and diving in the springs. I am 5'11" 215lbs and the XL fit great. Nice and snug with enough flexibility that I can still have full range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Obara

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 14 year old grandson a men’s small and fits great with a little spare room which will hopefully get him another season with it. Can’t go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Linda

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet, but seems nice enough for water skiing. I am 5'3", 120 lbs and had to buy a 12. Bought the 8, then 10, now 12. Paid return shipping once, which is no fun. I see some reviews talk about it running big. Not for me. Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: bob chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Not the best, not the worst I’ve used. Sizes seem to be accurate. 5’9, 180 lbs matches he’s to the chart listed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Cheap breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Had it about a month the fit isn’t great and the zipper is broken! Return window just closed so I’m out of luck, but steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonchick

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get past the choking feel
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s not a bad wetsuit. I returned it for one issue I couldn’t get over. The neck has a cuff that is too tight and felt like it was choking me. Otherwise it fit well and worked well. Just couldn’t get past the choking feel.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: First wetsuit, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wetsuit with the intention of using my jetski through the winter, first trip out mid October, weather had a high of 50f, low of 39, and I was able to swim in the water, hands feet and face were cold, but the body and limbs were fine. Would buy again, fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: too dam small
customer_reviews.text: this wet suit is too dam small ! i have an old XL suit that is closer to fitting than this XXX. did not have opertunity to use until October 9th and now find it is no where near a size XXX. suit is plenty long by 4-5 inches excess legs and arms but can not get over shoulders and in no way will it zip on me. by no means is this a XXX wet suit. piece of crap and now can not return !!!
customer_reviews.author: shirt

customer_reviews.title: Zipper breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Finally went to the beach to try it out today. The moment I tried to zip it up, the zipper broke and that was my beautiful experience of using your product. I didn't even get to use it in the water and tried to be as delicate as I could when I equipped it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suit. Easy on and off with good insulation in 75 degree water. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would say 115 lbs and 5'6" would be about right at the top end.
customer_reviews.text: It is made really well and it feels good, but the body length was too short. My gtrandson is 5'10 inches and 115 lbs. It was a tiny bit roomy but the real problem was it was too short in the crotch and the legs were about 8 inches short,
customer_reviews.author: noreen

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know too much about wetsuits but this one is very comfy, very high quality, and nice looking. I use it primarily for flounder gigging and water sports.
customer_reviews.author: Sstewart95

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I received my Mens Wetsuit today and it fits perfect and feels very good - I got a "Large" and I'm 5'10" and 165 pounds. I tried it this past weekend and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Mariano C.

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is 6'2" & about 195# ... I probably could have gotten XL instead of L but it fit him OK. If I had it to order again, I would get the XL.
customer_reviews.author: JKatz

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money! Keep me warm in northern California ocean water in December!
customer_reviews.author: c. hop.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Keeps me warm in the cold waters and when you get out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: John Katzer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: 5,10" 140 lbs med fit great. Spent all day in a cold river and this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: MissBliss73

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it should
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so we could leave the dock in the lake for an extra month or so. Worked as expected. Was able to jump in the 45 degree water without going into hyperthermia and remove the dock and paddle boat. Need to think about getting some boots for next year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Well made but on the large size for me I ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made but on the large size for me I weigh 230 @ 5-10 Length about 2" to long and ankles loose but can tuck into boots Wrist loose I think I should have ordered an XL for my size but cannot beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Deep water

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit. Bought it to do unheated pool water aerobic workouts and it works great, enabling high activity and full range of motion with both upper and lower body movements. I am 5'7", weigh 160, and Size 14 fit perfectly for my intended active purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortability
customer_reviews.text: It was surprisingly lose and comfortable, when compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wakeboarding.
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap, end or beginning of season wetsuit, this works perfectly. I bought this for wakeboarding in October in Central Illinois for water temps 67-74°F and it worked great. Now, if you plan on being in the water for hours on end like west or east coast surfers then I would buy a $300 - $400 name brand wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: 3XL? Are you kidding me? Couldn't even fit in the wetsuit let alone get it over my shoulders. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cousteau Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this thing is great. It is a little loose around the ankles and wrists so Some water does get in. That being said, it’s a 3/2, you shouldn’t be going in super cold water anyways. Was great for diving caverns in FL (72 degrees). Went with the XL and I’m 5’9 220. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this wetsuit for the money. The material is so soft and stretchy, and feels great against my skin. Felt very comfortable first time I tried it on, and feels like it's gonna feel great in the water. I'm 5'9", 175 lbs, and the Large fits great! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: N. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: They fit amazing and feel very strong. Gonna be a great season
customer_reviews.author: william s, yohn

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit but smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit but smaller size. Good value for money and wet suit fits okay since I ordered a larger size than required
customer_reviews.author: Mr Antony Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very good material, if you order the proper size it will fit you very nicely.. I strongly recommend it . I am 5’9 207 lbs waist 36
customer_reviews.author: Linux

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. But . . . I use this on a sit-on-top kayak in the Gulf. Would like to have a crotch zipper rather than have to strip it off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Long

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit bad quality and/or came with hole
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a hole after the first use! Could feel the cold water seeping in. Either bad quality or sent me bad one. NOT HAPPY. 😡😡 Would be great if they replaced it
customer_reviews.author: Meshack Burton

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my 16 year old said it was perfect for his trip to the river
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Felix

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Made well, looks great but cute clightly small. I can make it work, but would suggest going up one size to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: AC904411

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit - love the quality and look. Been on 20+ dives and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing is great. The fit was as expected and better than the more expensive wetsuits I've bought online.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Ray

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: nice keeps sun and critters off of you. speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Ive been paddeling out with this wetsuit several days a week for well over a year. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Renz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son for boogy boarding in northern California. He had a blast and stayed out for hours. Good quality for the price. Easy to don/doff
customer_reviews.author: kimberly glick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was just perfect!!! Thank-U!! Buuut, my husband made a mistake with the size of the wetsuit😔 Too big!!!
customer_reviews.author: ana maria diaz cobos

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my husband, fits him ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, fits him perfectly and he absolutely loves it. Hard to buy these things online and this was a win.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought one sooner. Great fit. Nice and sturdy. I used to be the first one out of the water when I started to get cold. Now I can swim with my kids and I’m the last one out.
customer_reviews.author: Touched by Dog

customer_reviews.title: XL is for hefty folks, not tall folks
customer_reviews.text: The XL is made for people who are large around the waist, not for people who are simply tall. Also, the arm and leg cuffs are way too big, so they don't create a good seal. I wrapped my leg cuffs in duct tape, and that helpeded but the suit was still baggy pretty much everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac777

customer_reviews.title: I think I bought the medium, it fits well ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I bought the medium, it fits well. This is half the price they sell wetsuits at a dive shop for basically the exact same thing. Its worth buying, for winter surf or dives. AND I'm a real person. Leif VanHorn @ leifvanhorn333@gmail.com.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I like it it works for me I'll try and get ...
customer_reviews.text: But I like it it works for me I'll try and get a bigger one to see if I like that better . Someday but I'll been in the water that was 35* and I was find .
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey j sojot

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I’m 6,6’ 200 lbs. and got XL. Fitted a bit loose on the feet and hands, besides that, everthing was good
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: ankles and wrist oversized
customer_reviews.text: Beware its a bit large compared to the size chart and the gap between the suit and the wrist and ankles allow water flow, diminishing the effeciency of the heat retention. Otherwise it has and excellent price value relation
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My son needed this for a quick tournament and it was inexpensive (compared to others), good quality and worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Pattip

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Mens Wetsuits Jumpsuit Neoprene 3/2mm and 5/4mm Full Body Diving Suit for Men
feature_bullets: MULTI SPORT WETSUIT: Wetsuit designed for all water sports like diving, scuba, paddle boarding, surfing, or kayaking.
DURABILITY: Spot taped at stress points and flatlock seams provide a smooth interior and exterior surface to ensure maximum comfort and durability.
NEOPRENE: Constructed with premium neoprene for a comfortable and athletic fit.
3/2mm neoprene for warmth without sacrificing flexibility.3mm chest panel for added warmth and 2mm sleeves for greater flexibility
FEATURES: Easy-reach, extra-long leash and easy on with heavy-duty YKK back zipper ; Order the product according to your body measurements.
